comment.author: 14451627@N00
comment._content: Great of you to add this to the "Searching to the Snowy" anything else related to the river would be much appreciated.

comment.author: 45104424@N00
comment._content: This is near the top of Mt Kosciuszko.  A big drift forms every winter above Lake Cootapatamba which is in the valley to the right of the photographer.  The drift lingers well into summer, and occasionally there are remnants that last through to the next winter.  The viewpoint is looking north along the Main Range.

comment.author: 24392551@N02
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Mountain Society, and we'd love to have this added to the group! Please feel free to enjoy our group as a member and tag you photo with "Mountain Society"
